bodyplans.bodyplan: playable culture human normalgenders terms generic: "human" male: "man" female: "woman" ascii char: U+0068 tallness: roll 1d50+150 hair length: roll 1d4+5 color: oneof blond, brown, black,red, gray, white, auburn -- repeating a few options to increase their chances skin type skin color: oneof light, light, light, pale, pale, dark, dark, olive eyes color: oneof sienna, teal, slategray, olive, seagreen, darkslateblue, dimgray, forestgreen face normal ears human legs ass virgin size: roll 1d4+4 fuckable waist: roll 1d4+1 hips: roll 1d2+4 costume casual -- The creature creator adjusts this part. fertility: roll 1d15+5 breastrow amount: 2 size: roll 1d5+1 nipples: 1 size: 0.5 milksource vagina virgin fuckable clit: 0.25 penis thickness: 2.5 length: roll 1d5+13 cumsource canfuck balls amount: 2 costume casual items ponifier foxite knife equipped

items.item:
multiuse description: "You do not want to know." ascii char: U+00A1 fore aquamarine
morph littlepony 0 window adjustview clearsubs
-- This is all we'll specify. ascii char: U+03B5 -- Books specifically have their color determined by ID.
nouse ascii char: U+00A7 fore: brown
canfuck -- Metrics are needed if an item has canfuck. thickness: 2.75 length: 42 weight medium ascii char: U+0021 fore: brown

multiuse description: "This is Foxite. It turns you into a fox with repeated usages." ascii char: U+00A1 fore aquamarine
morph fox 0 window adjustview clearsubs

ascii char: U+00A1 fore chartreuse
!<< It's no use. >>

unique description: "A blood-red ruby in the shape of a droplet." ascii char: U+25CA fore: crimson
-- Just display a nice custom error. !<< The ruby pendant has no use whatsoever, really. It just looks nice. >>

ascii char U+00A1 fore lightsalmon
-- Text stolen from CoC's Whisker Fruit item, for now.
|<< You take a bite of the fruit and gulp it down. It's thick and juicy and has an almost overpowering sweetness. Nevertheless, it is delicious and you certainly could use a meal. You devour the fruit, stopping only when the hard, nubby pit is left, which you toss aside. >>
-- always increase speed gettagval "speed" if it < 75 if it < 30 |<< [break]You feel...more balanced, sure of step. You're certain that you've become just a little bit faster. >> inctagval "speed" 2 else if it < 60 |<< [break]You stumble as you shift position, surprised by how quickly you move. After a moment or two of disorientation, you adjust. You're certain that you can run faster now. >> inctagval "speed" 1 else |<< [break]You pause mid-step and crouch. Your leg muscles have cramped up like crazy. After a few moments, the pain passes and you feel like you could chase anything down. >> inctagval "speed" 0.5 endif endif -- end endif
-- sometimes increase charisma
-- grow cat ears checktag "ears/cat" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]Your ears tingle and begin to change shape. Within a few moments, they've become long and feline. Thanks to the new fuzzy organs, you find yourself able to hear things that eluded your notice up until now. [break]<cWhite>You now have cat ears.<c> >>
removetag "ears" addtag "ears" addtag "ears" "cat" end endif
-- grow cat tail checktag "tail/genbeast" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]You pause and tilt your head... something feels different. Ah, that's what it is; you turn around and look down at your tail as it starts to change shape, narrowing and sprouting glossy fur. [break]<cWhite>You now have a cat tail.<c> >>
removetag "tail" addtag "tail" addtag "tail" "genbeast"
|<< [break]<cYellow>Now would be an excellent time to stop taking this stuff.<c> >> end endif
-- grow fangs
-- grow fur checktag "fur" if not exists |<< [break]<cWhite>You grow fur all over. >> renametag "skin" "fur" end endif
-- grow digitigrade legs
-- grow up to two extra breast rows

ascii char U+00A1 fore mistyrose
-- Text stolen from CoC's Canine Pepper item, for now.
|<< The pepper is strangely spicy but very tasty. >>
-- always increase strength gettagval "strength" if it < 50 |<< [break]Your muscles feel more toned. >> inctagval "strength" 2 endif
-- sometimes increase charisma
-- grow dog ears checktag "ears/dog" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]Your ears transform, becoming more canine in appearance.[break]<cWhite>You now have dog ears.<c> >>
removetag "ears" addtag "ears" addtag "ears" "dog" end endif
-- grow dog tail checktag "tail/dog" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]You feel your backside shift and change, flesh molding and displacing into a long puffy tail![break]<cWhite>You now have a dog tail.<c> >>
removetag "tail" addtag "tail" addtag "tail" "dog"
|<< [break]<cYellow>Now would be an excellent time to stop taking this stuff.<c> >> end endif
-- grow fangs
-- grow fur checktag "fur" if not exists |<< [break]<cWhite>You grow fur all over. >> renametag "skin" "fur" end endif
-- grow digitigrade legs
-- grow up to two extra breast rows

ascii char U+00A1 fore orangered
|<< You apply the fox morph potion. >>
-- always increase cunning gettagval "cunning" if it < 50 |<< [break]You feel more cunning. >> inctagval "cunning" 2 endif
-- sometimes increase charisma
-- grow dog ears checktag "ears/genbeast" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break][Your] head itches as [you] grow[s] a pair of fuzzy, pointed ears.[break]<cWhite>[You] now [have] fox ears.<c> >>
removetag "ears" addtag "ears" addtag "ears" "genbeast" end endif
-- grow fox tail checktag "tail/fox" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]A fox tail sprouts from just above [your] butt.[break]<cWhite>[You] now [have] a fox tail.<c> >>
removetag "tail" addtag "tail" addtag "tail" "fox"
|<< [break]<cYellow>Now would be an excellent time to stop taking this stuff.<c> >> end endif
-- grow fangs
-- grow fur checktag "fur" if not exists |<< [break]<cWhite>[Your] whole body itches as a thin layer of brown fur grows all over. >> -- renametag "skin" "fur" removetag "skin" removetag "rubber" removetag "slime" removetag "scales" addtag "fur" addtag "fur" "brown" setspecies "foxmorph" "foxboy" "foxgirl" adjustview end endif
-- grow digitigrade legs

ascii char U+00A1 fore skyblue
|<< You apply the bunny morph potion. >>
-- always increase libido gettagval "libido" if it < 80 |<< [break]You feel hornier. >> inctagval "libido" 4 endif
-- grow bunny ears checktag "ears/bunny" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]Your ears transform, becoming more bunny in appearance.[break]<cWhite>You now have bunny ears.<c> >>
removetag "ears" addtag "ears" addtag "ears" "bunny" end endif
-- grow bunny tail checktag "tail/bunny" if not exists -- should check the existing type first |<< [break]You feel your backside shift and change, flesh molding and displacing into an adorable puffball![break]<cWhite>You now have a bunny tail.<c> >>
removetag "tail" addtag "tail" addtag "tail" "bunny"
|<< [break]<cYellow>Now would be an excellent time to stop taking this stuff.<c> >> end endif
-- grow fur checktag "fur" if not exists |<< [break]<cWhite>You grow fur all over. >> renametag "skin" "fur" end endif
